title: GMC Handwara Jobs 2026 - Apply Online for 108 Junior Staff Nurse Posts
description: The Government Medical College (GMC) Handwara has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 108 Junior Staff Nurse Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ GNM, B.Sc Nursing, and 12th can apply for the GMC Handwara Jobs 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process...
